name: Robin Hood: Defender of the Crown
name_original: Robin Hood: Defender of the Crown
description:
Robin Hood: Defender of the Crown is a strategy, arcade and fighting game developed by Cinemaware and Atomic Planet Entertainment. It came out on 09-10-2003. Capcom published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Robin Hood: Defender of the Crown is available on PC.
